duas.title: Dua for Guidance (Istikhara)
duas.dua: اللهم إني أستخيرك بعلمك وأستقدرك بقدرتك وأسألك من فضلك العظيم
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek Your guidance (in making a choice) by virtue of Your knowledge, and I seek ability by virtue of Your power, and I ask You of Your great bounty.
duas.benefits: This dua is recited when making a significant decision. It seeks Allah's guidance and wisdom to choose what is best.

duas.title: Dua for Ease and Comfort
duas.translation: My Lord, expand for me my chest.
duas.benefits: Provides ease and comfort in challenging situations.

duas.title: Dua for Knowledge
duas.translation: My Lord, increase me in knowledge.
duas.benefits: Encourages the pursuit of knowledge and wisdom.

duas.title: Dua for Forgiveness
duas.benefits: Removes sins and brings mercy and forgiveness from Allah.

duas.title: Dua for Protection
duas.benefits: Starting any task with this ensures Allah's blessings and protection.

duas.title: Dua for Gratitude
duas.benefits: Expresses gratitude to Allah for His countless blessings.

duas.title: Dua for Glorifying Allah
duas.benefits: Increases the believer’s awareness and consciousness of Allah's perfection.

duas.title: Dua for Affirming Greatness
duas.benefits: Affirms the greatness and majesty of Allah, increasing faith and reliance on Him.

duas.title: Dua for Monotheism
duas.translation: There is no god but Allah.
duas.benefits: Affirms monotheism and strengthens faith in the oneness of Allah.

duas.title: Dua for Calamity
duas.translation: Indeed we belong to Allah, and indeed to Him we will return.
duas.benefits: Provides comfort and solace during times of loss and calamity.

duas.title: Dua for Well-being
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for forgiveness and well-being.
duas.benefits: Seeks Allah's forgiveness and overall well-being.

duas.title: Dua for Paradise
duas.translation: O Allah, make me among the people of Paradise.

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Evil
duas.dua: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا عَمِلْتُ
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the evil of what I have done.
duas.benefits: Seeks protection from the consequences of one's wrong actions.

duas.title: Dua for Strengthening Faith
duas.dua: اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّي لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ
duas.translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, there is no god but You.
duas.benefits: Affirms faith and reliance on Allah.

duas.title: Dua for Blessing in Provision
duas.translation: O Allah, bless me in my provision.
duas.benefits: Asks for blessings in one's sustenance.

duas.title: Dua for Parents' Forgiveness
duas.translation: My Lord, forgive me and my parents.
duas.benefits: Seeks forgiveness for oneself and one's parents.

duas.title: Dua for Healing
duas.benefits: Asks for healing and good health.

duas.title: Dua for Parents' Mercy
duas.translation: My Lord, have mercy upon them as they brought me up [when I was] small.
duas.benefits: Prays for mercy upon one's parents for their care and upbringing.

duas.title: Dua for Consistency in Prayer
duas.translation: My Lord, make me an establisher of prayer.
duas.benefits: Asks for consistency and devotion in performing prayers.
